      • extendedEuclideanAlgorithm

        @NotNull
public static kotlin.Triple<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Long,java.lang.Long> extendedEuclideanAlgorithm(long x,
                                                                                                              long y)

        Calculate a and b such that a x + b y = [x, y] where [x, y] is GCD of x and y.

        Returns:
        A triple of (a, b, [x,y]) i.e. t.first * x + t.second * y = t.third
